column4: my desktop icons aren't showing, and nautilus won't run. can someone help?
first what version of nautilus?
that is the current version.  have you tried checking for dependencies?
uh, it's installed fine
ok
this happened shortly after my power suppy exploded :-/
i'm wondering what could be causing your icons to disappear
nautilus not working? :P
new power supply now?
nautilus is s'posed to do the icons too
yep
i'm looking at my nautilus
new user seems to work fine
but there's too much on this account for me to switch, so i need to fix this one
Preferences > Views on the account with problems
make sure you have Icon View enabled
i hate icon view. i use list view, and that doesn't affect ability to see desktop icons
ah, on the desktop.  sorry
you got me.  that is a difficult problem
as far as the power supply goes, i don't see how that could be the source (assuming you replaced and rebooted)
